meanings.sent1: The man wore the tweediest jacket in the room.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was the tweediest at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked tweediest when it curled up on the tweed sofa.
meanings.sent4: The tweediest fabric whispered tales of the Scottish highlands.
meanings.sent5: The tweediest pattern reminded her of her grandfather's old armchair.

meanings.sent1: This is the tweediest scarf I own.
meanings.sent2: The tweediest hat in the store caught his eye.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked tweediest when it tried to wear sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the tweediest melody in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The tweediest aroma of the bakery made his mouth water.
